description: This table extracts the related multiple response Applied Promotion Discount Amount (I PES 1008) item.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number corresponding to the promotion record. This promotion record can be looked up by referencing this line number in PR_EST_PROMOTION_INFO.

columns.name: APPLIED_PROMO_DISCOUNT_AMT
columns.description: The applied promotion discount amount per promotion record on the estimate.
